Html:
Hi Sebastian,

Is there any way to output the ROT to the screen or log file?

I'd like to see a list of all objects that are currently in the ROT.

Thank you!

There was a Tool called IROTVIEW.EXE in Visual Studio once. But Google lists following link, if you search for it:

https://social.msdn.microsoft.com/Forums/vstudio/en-US/ccccc9bd-f21a-4f74-a3f0-64a594fa1b16/where-is-irotview?forum=vsx
